title: From Fury to Freedom
description: Raul Ries...to thos who knew him in the 60s and early 70s. his name stood for fear. For fighting. For fury. To his high school friends he was a violent, dangerous combatant. To his family he was a time bomb. ready to explode at any moment. And to those who battled beside him in Vietnam he was an angry, bitter killer. One sunday evening a miracle led Raul from black rage into inner peace. Raul Ries was never again the same. How could anyone be so totally transformed?
author: Raul Ries
